sentences.sContent: a nationwide search for a missing British tourist
sentences.sCn: 在全国范围内对一名失踪英国游客的搜寻

sentences.sContent: The figures show unemployment falling nationwide last month.
sentences.sCn: 数字显示，上个月失业数字正全国性地下降。

words.tran: 全国性地；以国民立场地；举国一致地

trans.tranOther: happening or existing in every part of the country
